author: fod8970
content:
<@!273808422753796097> 
I saw DV at the top of your recent roadmap, but I rarely hear about it outside of the DV communities. Can you please articulate the value you see in this advancement and maybe describe your vision for it?

Beyond the vanilla implementation of the SSV approach, the DV projects seem fairly open-ended in regards to their supporting features and priorities. The community has the power to influence them in a positive direction, but unfortunately, most people seem to be missing the complete picture.
